.
It is known for its stunning properies, beautiful lagoon, links golf course and proximity to Cape Town's attractions.

Milnerton is often seen as an area including the following Cambridge Estate, Century City, Du Noon, Joe Slovo Park, Lagoon Beach, Milnerton Ridge, Sanddrift, Tygerhof and Woodbridge Island.
, travel north on the R27 (the west coast road) which almost immediately passes through Milnerton (Lagoon Beach, Milnerton, Milnerton Ridge).

value: content=Welcome to our two bedroom apartment, situated in the newly developed Royal Ascot estate in Milnerton. With central Cape Town & V&A Waterfront a 15 minutes drive away, and only 5 minutes from Tables Bays beaches, it is located in an ideal area.
